name: Durka Sim Remastered
description:
Durka Sim series returns with a brand new (not really) game - Durka Sim Remastered!

Durka Sim Remastered is a remastered version of the first Durka Sim game. Explore the durka, fight the shiziks and find out what happened to John Lemon after the Prequel's events!

Features:

  • Revolutionary gameplay
  • Incredible art
  • Outstanding music by Toby Fox
  • Mind-blowing special effects
